Vision science research group within [LABELS laboratory](https://labels.ff.cuni.cz/) - joint lab of the 
[Institute of Psychology, Czech Academy of Sciences ](https://psu.cas.cz/en/)
and 
[Faculty of Arts, Charles University](https://www.ff.cuni.cz/).

We are interested in a variety of topics, ranging from eye-tracking and attention research to the scene perception and memory. We combine experimental research with computational modelling.
